fields.name: Wishful Thinking (Passive):
fields.value: You will told if anyone in the game is able to revive players currently. You will be told if this changes, when it changes.

fields.name: Understanding (Passive):
fields.value: After each evening, be given a list of the goals of players who placed below you. These will be randomly organized, and no more than one of the same goal will be listed.

fields.name: Practice (x1):
fields.value: Target any player and grant them any non-passive ability from any GIMT role, excluding those that directly allow accessing more abilities.

fields.name: Neutralize (1x, 150%):
fields.value: Attack someone with any non-locked attack ability from any GIMT role.

fields.name: Sway:
fields.value: Use during evening. Pick any player. They will be given the option to adopt the goal of someone who they shared an HN with. If they did not have an HN, this will do nothing.

fields.name: Resemble (x2):
fields.value: Use during the appropriate phase. Use any ability belonging to a dead player, given you have fulfilled its requirements.

fields.name: Incentivize (Locked):
fields.value: Unlocked on day 3. Create your own additional goal for any player besides yourself. They can fulfill either their original goal or this. This goal can show up in sway.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Create and/or reveal a situation in which all players are alive/can be revived and are/would be able to win together. Players who have already won are ignored.
